title: Some apps are not starting / stops in seconds
content:
I have a few apps that are not starting anymore, they start but in 1-2 seconds are moved in background and I see the home page (for the games I can see loading screen). The affected ones are:
Google search bar from home, Gmail, Clash Royale, Hogwarts Mistery, Adventure Escape Mysteries.

Other apps are loading fine: Chrome, banking, discord, pokemon go, revolut, whatsapp etc.

Restart phone did not worked, I'm up to date with the updates, remove app cache did not worked, remove data/ reinstall the app worked partially, if I close the app the issue appears, if after install I leave it in background is working when I'm bringing it back.
So the issue appears after first closing the app.

Changes to Wifi/data mobile, bluetooth/airplane mode did not do any improvement. I can not link the issue with any change to the phone, it appeared while using it.

I still have to try safe mode and reset to factory but I was wondering if anyone else have this strange behavior or have other suggestion.

Thank you.

Update: Safe mode did not worked, search and gmail are still not working.
